item.title: 阿克曼称将在内华达州重新注册管理公司
item.description: "亿万富翁、对冲基金经理比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）在 X 上回复一个关于公司离开特拉华州的帖子时说："我们正在内华达州重新注册我们的管理公司。【原文：“We are reincorporating our management company in Nevada,” billionaire hedge fund manager Bill Ackman said on X in a reply to a post about companies leaving Delaware.】

item.title: 石油光辉褪去，埃克森和雪佛龙勇敢面对 DeepSeek 风险，追逐人工智能未来
item.description: 大石油公司曾经是硅谷轻资产、高增长世界的对立面。现在，它正寻求大科技的帮助，以保持其相关性。【原文：Big Oil was once the antithesis of the asset-light, hyper-growth world of Silicon Valley. Now it’s looking to Big Tech to stay relevant.】

item.title: 特朗普将在其新关税战中发起众多炮火中的第一炮
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统正在发动关税战的第一炮，并迫不及待地预演下一炮。【原文：President Donald Trump is unleashing the first salvo of his tariff war and can hardly wait to preview the next barrage.】

item.title: 华尔街周报基准对通货膨胀和纽约市办公楼至关重要
item.description:
美联储为何坚持 2% 的通胀目标？【原文：

Why the Federal Reserve sticks to its 2% inflation target and what makes a Manhattan office building an A+ rather than a B

】

item.title: 华丽七侠从 "岩石周 "中脱颖而出，毫不动摇
item.description: 对于美国最大的科技公司来说，这一周的开端是来自中国人工智能新贵的致命一击，包括一系列关键性的财报。【原文：After a week for the biggest US technology companies that began with a body blow from a Chinese AI upstart and included a batch of pivotal earnings, the biggest surprise may be how well they made it through.】

item.title: 印度推出基础设施债券信用增级系统
item.description: 印度周六宣布，计划为为开发公路、港口和桥梁等项目而出售的公司债券设立信用增级机制。【原文：India on Saturday announced plans to create a credit enhancement facility for corporate bonds sold to develop projects like roads, ports and bridges.】

item.title: 印度削减进口关税以促进本地制造业和出口
item.description: 印度将削减从电子产品到纺织品等一系列产品的关税，以促进当地制造业发展并创造就业机会。【原文：India will cut tariffs on a slew of products in sectors ranging from electronics to textile, in an attempt to boost local manufacturing and create jobs.】

item.title: 特朗普应对美元 "困境 "的选择
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）重新掌权后，美元多头蠢蠢欲动，这是有道理的。每当他或他的副手们宣布即将加征关税时（也许就在今天），美元兑墨西哥比索和加元等货币就会大涨。但所有这些威胁都在加剧货币市场的基本困境，特朗普的一位潜在顾问最近强调了这一点。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s return to power has fired up dollar bulls—and for good reason. The greenback surges against the likes of the Mexican peso and Canadian dollar whenever he or his lieutenants proclaim tariff hikes are in the offing (perhaps as soon as today). But all of those threats are worsening a fundamental dilemma in the currency market, one recently highlighted by one of Trump’s potential incoming advisers.】

item.title: 印度延长 GIFT 城市税收减免政策以吸引新投资
item.description: 印度政府宣布了一系列新措施，以促进对古吉拉特邦国际金融科技城（GIFT City）的投资，该城是印度金融市场自由化的试验。【原文：India’s government announced a fresh set of measures to boost investments in the Gujarat International Finance Tec-City, or GIFT City, India’s experiment to liberalize its financial markets.】

item.title: 经济学家称印度预算大胆，是亟需的 "财政奇才
item.description: 据经济学家称，印度财政部长在促进消费和缩小财政赤字之间走钢丝，因为政府正试图让放缓的经济重回正轨。【原文：India’s finance minister walked the tightrope between boosting consumption and narrowing the fiscal deficit as the government attempts to bring a slowing economy back on track, according to economists.】

item.title: 伊斯坦布尔消费者价格指数一月份上涨 5.16
item.description: 伊斯坦布尔 1 月份的消费者价格指数月率上升了 5.16%，预示着土耳其将在下周一公布全国月度通胀数据。【原文：The consumer price index for Istanbul rose 5.16% on a monthly basis in January, pointing to a tick up for Turkey’s national month-on-month inflation figure that’s due Monday.】

item.title: 据《共和报》报道，Tamburi 正在酝酿合并或首次公开募股 Alpitour
item.description: 据《共和国报》（La Repubblica）周六报道，Tamburi Investment Partners SpA 在增持 Alpitour 旅游运营商的股份后，正在考虑下一步的行动，但没有说明是如何获得这一信息的。【原文：Tamburi Investment Partners SpA is considering the next steps for Alpitour after increasing its stake in the tour operator, newspaper La Repubblica reported on Saturday, without saying how it obtained the information.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：美联储按兵不动，欧洲央行却降低利率
item.description: 在美国经济活动强劲、劳动力市场健康的背景下，美联储官员在利率问题上谨慎行事，等待特朗普政府的政策动向。【原文：Federal Reserve officials are treading cautiously on interest rates against a backdrop of sturdy US economic activity and a healthy labor market as officials await policy moves from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 土耳其提高大部分基金的里拉存款预提税
item.description: 土耳其增加了对存款和基金的预扣税，以支持其预算，同时也可能降低里拉资产的吸引力。【原文：Turkey increased withholding tax on deposits and funds in an attempt to support its budget, while also potentially making lira assets less attractive.】

item.title: 俄罗斯用导弹和无人机轰炸乌克兰，造成六人死亡
item.description: 乌克兰当局称，在俄罗斯使用导弹、无人机和航空炸弹进行猛烈轰炸后，乌克兰一夜之间至少有六人丧生，数人受伤。【原文：At least six people were killed and several more injured overnight in Ukraine following a heavy Russian bombardment using missiles, drones and aerial bombs, Ukrainian authorities said.】

item.title: 台湾禁止所有公共机构使用 DeepSeek 人工智能服务
item.description: 台湾以安全为由，禁止其所有政府机构和关键基础设施服务提供商使用中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 的技术。【原文：Taiwan barred all of its government agencies and critical infrastructure service providers from using Chinese artificial-intelligence startup DeepSeek’s technology, citing security concerns.】

item.title: 欧洲的巨型电力电缆网络正在成为政治网络
item.description: 挪威政府本周的垮台使人们开始关注欧洲数百条跨境电力传输线，以及它们是如何被转化为政治武器的。【原文：The collapse of Norway’s government this week brings into focus the hundreds of cables transporting electricity across borders in Europe and how they’re being transformed into political weapons.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机激增凸显俄罗斯炼油风险
item.description: 在乌克兰无人机对俄罗斯炼油厂的袭击激增（包括周五发生的一起新事件）之后，俄罗斯继续以正常速度生产燃料的能力正变得越来越岌岌可危。【原文：Russia’s ability to keep making fuel at the normal pace is looking increasingly precarious following a surge in Ukrainian drone attacks on the nation’s oil refineries, including a fresh incident on Friday.】

item.title: 印度寻求在下一财年征收 90 亿美元的股票交易税
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）在预算中预计，明年印度将从证券交易征税中获得更多税收，增幅将超过 40%，达到 90 亿美元。【原文：India expects to collect more taxes from levies imposed on securities trading with Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman’s budget estimating an over 40% jump in such collection to cross $9 billion next year.】

item.title: 印度削减部分进口税以促进电子产品生产
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的政府正在努力加强本地制造业，因此印度在联邦预算中取消了对几种电子元件征收的进口税。【原文：India scrapped import taxes on several electronics components in the federal budget, as Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s administration seeks to bolster local manufacturing.】

item.title: 印度目标从印度央行和银行获得 9% 的提振，以抵消减税的影响
item.description: 印度政府预计，下一财年来自中央银行和公有金融机构的收入将增长 9%，有助于抵消税收收入的下降。【原文：India’s government expects income from the central bank and public-owned financial institutions to increase 9% in the coming fiscal year, helping to offset a drop in tax revenue.】

item.title: 印度将放宽核法律以吸引私人资本
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）表示，印度政府将修订核法律，以吸引私人资本并促进该行业的发展，指望原子能帮助印度摆脱化石燃料的依赖。【原文：India’s government will amend its nuclear laws to draw private capital and boost the sector’s growth, counting on atomic energy to help the country wean itself off fossil fuels, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said.】

item.title: 自英国脱欧投票以来，伦敦金融城受到的冲击大于其他经济体
item.description: 伦敦金融城曾被视为英国服务业皇冠上的明珠，但在英国脱欧公投后的几年里，其表现甚至不如其他经济部门。【原文：The City of London, once considered the crown jewel of Britain’s dominant services sector, has performed even worse than the rest of the economy in the years following the Brexit referendum.】

item.title: 印度明年将出售 1,710 亿美元债券为支出提供资金
item.description: 印度计划在下一财年出售总额为 14.82 万亿卢比（约合 1,710 亿美元）的债券。【原文：India plans to sell gross 14.82 trillion rupees ($171 billion) of bonds in the next fiscal year.】

item.title: 莫迪第三任期首份完整预算案的得与失
item.description: 财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）在第三届政府任期内的首个全年预算报告中概述了针对青年、妇女和农业的计划。【原文：Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman started her speech for government’s first full-year budget in the third term outlining plans aimed at youth, women, and agriculture.】

item.title: 印度目标缩小预算赤字，通过改革促进增长
item.description: 印度政府的目标是在下一个财政年度略微减少预算赤字，同时重点关注税收、电力和城市发展等关键领域的改革，以促进这个亚洲第三大经济体的增长。【原文：India’s government is targeting a slightly smaller budget deficit in the coming fiscal year, while focusing on reforms in key areas like taxes, power and urban development to boost growth in Asia’s third-largest economy.】

item.title: 新加坡将继续与美国密切合作，应对 DeepSeek 引起的担忧
item.description: 新加坡表示，由于担心中国人工智能公司 DeepSeek 通过岛内中介获得英伟达公司的芯片，新加坡海关和执法部门将继续与美国同行密切合作。【原文：Singapore said its customs and law enforcement departments will continue to work closely with US counterparts amid concerns China AI firm DeepSeek obtained Nvidia Corp. chips through intermediaries on the island.】

item.title: 德国重新思考军民研究分离问题
item.description: 在德国加大军费开支的同时，一些政治家和国防管理人员认为，公立大学是德国尚未开发的最大资源之一，双方正在酝酿一场冲突。【原文：As Germany ramps up spending on its military, a clash is brewing around what some politicians and defense executives say is one of the nation’s biggest untapped resources: public universities.】

item.title: 澳门博彩业收入低于预期，进一步显示经济增长放缓
item.description: 澳门一月份的博彩收入下降了 5.6%，低于分析师的预期，而且有迹象表明，中国疲软的消费情绪正在拖累这个全球最大博彩中心的经济复苏。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue fell 5.6% in January, missing analyst expectations and adding to signs that China’s weak consumer sentiment is dragging down a recovery in the world’s biggest gambling hub.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长预计今年降息步伐放缓
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，随着货币当局采取放缓的宽松政策步伐，基准利率今年可能会下调半个百分点。【原文：Philippine central bank Governor Eli Remolona said the benchmark interest rate may be reduced by a half percentage point this year, as monetary authorities adopt a slower pace of policy easing.】
